div.p:
Clicking the Clan Development button opens a panel showing all the
technologies we can research to further our clan.

This shows our current level of modernisation. Improving our civic buildings
and infrastructure throughout our provinces, will increase
modernisation further, opening up new technologies.

There are two branches of technology available: civil policy and military
technologies. The latter can unlock new weapons, troop types and special abilities.

Researching civil policy will improve our clan's infrastructure and economy.
Let's left-click a technology to begin. Technologies take a number
